events.text: WOAH! HA HA HA! WHAT A PLEASANT SURPISE! Do my eye sockets decieve me or is that Lilian, or Rose? I forget which one you go by.
Am- AM I RILEY! HA HA HA! no deary no Riley is long gone! I go by [color=#fafbce]RIALETY[/color] now!
As if I would listen to the rambling of a crazy woman.

You took advantage of that crazy woman!
Used her- me as a lab rat!

I did. And I plan to it again.
You see I planned this all. Of course I expected you to come a bit later. 
Maybe when your legs had developed. 
But you came early and- oh- you brought a friend!
You see, you were the closest thing to a success for the immortality. 
Second to me of course.
And I wanted to see why that was. So I told you about the [color=#b58353]GREAT SEEDS[/color]. Baited you to come here on your own accord.
If you wanted to use me why didn't you just take me when you went to visit before?

Oh! Because, at the time you were still a budding flower. I wasn't sure if you would be of any use.
But now... Now you've fully grown into what I desire. What I crave!
You're not going to use me like you did before!

Oh but I already have, have I not?
You did clear out the castle and my lab of any dangers.
And you did unlock that door keeping me inside here.
That means I am free of this hell I've been stuck in for months!
Now come, let me use you to create the greatest thing man has ever seen.
Oh! But I don't remember asking if you wanted to.
